title: 2BR Townhome, Charming Home, Pet Friendly, Great Location
posting_body: ['🌞 300 Granada Townhomes 🏡', '🐕', 'Pet Friendly', '🐈', 'Rental Rate:', '$4450/month', '📍 Location:', '300 Granada Drive, Mountain View, CA 94043', 'Townhome for Rent:', '2 Bedrooms -2.5 Bathrooms - 992 Square Feet', 'Available Now❗', '📞 Call us today to schedule a tour.', '📆', 'show contact info', 'Description:', 'A rare gem in Silicon Valley!', '💎', 'A home of your own, without the stress of owning.', 'Originally built to condominium standards, 300 Granada is nestled in a peaceful, tree-lined Mountain View Neighborhood.', 'Thoughtful Finishes in Each Home', 'Choose a newly remodeled townhome or flat updated with top-of-the-line features: luxe quartz countertops, tile backsplash, recessed lighting, and stainless steel appliances.', 'Extend your living experience outdoors with your own private patio, deck, or yard.', 'After a long day at work pulling up to your own private attached garage and entrance makes for the perfect Welcome Home.', 'Located in the Heart of Mountain View', 'With quick and easy access to 85, 82, 101, and the Mountain View Caltrain Station.', 'You can now spend more time at home enjoying a cup of coffee ☕ than worrying about your commute.', 'Walking distance from Stevenson Park, a spacious park featuring sports fields, tennis courts, playground, and picnic area.', 'Property Amenities:', '✨ Newly Renovated', '✨ Spacious Island', '✨ Washer and Dryer', '✨ Air Conditioning', '✨ Hardwood Floors', '✨ Private Backyard', '✨ Private Garage', '👉 Call to schedule your tour at', 'show contact info', '.', 'Leasing Office located at', '600 N Whisman, MV 94043', 'Office Hours:', 'M-F 9-5, Sat/Sun by appt only.', 'Professionally Managed By: BLVD Residential || <URL>']
